long_description: The midweight SealSkinz Midweight Mid-Length socks feature waterproof, highly breathable membranes that'll keep your feet dry and comfortable when you're hiking in cold, wet weather. Seamless, close-fitting knit construction is ideal for hiking boots; designed to come up to mid-calf height for good coverage in inclement weather. Stretchy nylon/elastane exteriors are lined with soft merino wool/nylon/acrylic/elastane for great comfort next to skin; merino wool blend wicks moisture away from your feet. Elastic insteps and panels by the Achilles tendons provide support. Midweight Mid-Length socks deliver midweight cushioning. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The midweight SealSkinz Midweight Mid-Length socks feature waterproof, highly breathable membranes that'll keep your feet dry and comfortable when you're hiking in cold, wet weather.
